mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO, GROUP_NO, STEP, DEPTH, TITLE, CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, DEL_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARDNO.NEXTVAL, #{groupNo}, #{step}, #{depth}, #{title}, #{content}, #{memberNo}, #{memberId}, #{delYn} )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_NO ASC) AS rn, BOARD_NO AS boardNo, GROUP_NO AS groupNo, STEP AS step, DEPTH AS depth, VIEW_CNT AS viewCnt, TITLE AS title, CONTENT AS content, MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, MEMBER_ID AS memberId, DEL_YN AS delYn, TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS regDate, TO_CHAR(MODDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS modDate FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1
) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{totalCount} - #{endRow} + 1 AND #{totalCount} - #{startRow} + 1 ORDER BY rn DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1
